entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
